text: Ara amadera nidarsanasamuha pathate kichu'i amadera badha deya na e bhinna ye pracinakalinara se-saba pratyakhyana karechila. Ara amara chamuda jatike diyechilama usti -- eka spasta nidarsanarupe, kintu tara ora prati an'yaya karechila. Bastutah amara nidarsanasamuha patha'i na husiyamra karara jan'ye chara.
